sentences.sCn: 似乎互不相关的零星信息

sentences.sContent: ...The brain is a seemingly endless library...
...The author's mother taught him a valuable lesson by pointing out lots of flaws in his seemingly perfect essay...
...And though our own world was seemingly self-contained...
...It is worth mentioning that those seemingly basic and elementary skills we learned in school actually play a significantly indispensable role in our future works...

trans.tranOther: appearing to have a particular quality, when this may or may not be true
